Text: O̩ma-mi, e̩ ki gbenyo̩ uko̩ o̩la-mi n,
todu e-le̩ abutʼojolugbo-we̩
Umo̩la kpai ochochi ki kwo bʼuwe̩ te̩ n;
Abe̩le̩ tak uwe̩ ali ulieju kpai uwohi
Mʼe̩do̩-we̩ kono Jihofa chaka,
E̩ ki fʼowñ ma o̩na du kʼe̩ le,
Uwe̩ ki chʼanibe eju o̩la-we̩ n;
I aje̩ ñw ukodo-we̩ ki bie̩
E̩ nʼidu kʼe̩ ne̩ dojima ñw Jihofa
abe̩le̩ tak aka aka-we̩ ako̩ kʼi abʼe̩ jo̩,
O̩ma-mi, o̩la ki Jihofa akʼuwe̩ le̩ e̩ ki do̩ rʼibe̩te̩ n
todu Jihofa adʼo̩la biu e̩ne̩ kʼi afe̩do̩-wñ,
E̩ne̩ ki fʼibe li gbede,
todu ile e-le̩ eje̩ nyo̩ tʼile ajifa eje̩ le
I chʼe̩wñ akoko tu rubi
Ojolugbo dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩;
O̩na o̩na-wñ chʼo̩na ube̩do̩,
Owñ le̩ chʼoli e-iñmi ñw abo ku ma gwo̩nyʼu;
Ibe oñ Jihofa ne̩ chʼunyane̩ ile̩-i;
e̩wñ kʼi ma oñ unefu le̩ muko̩da ojoji jo̩,
O̩ma-mi, e̩ ki je̩ kʼi kwo bʼuwe̩ eju te̩ n;
abe̩le̩ abʼe-le̩ achʼiñmi ñw onugo-we̩
Tak uwe̩ atʼo̩na-we̩ ale to̩ko̩o̩
E̩gba kʼe̩ dachi, ailo abʼe̩ n;
E̩ ki railo e̩wñ okpo kʼi awa achigili n,
todu Jihofa achʼuke̩do̩no-we̩,
E̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩ mʼe̩nyo̩ ñw abo ki dukpe̩ ku ma ne̩,
E̩ ki ka ñw ekeji-we̩ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ wa,
E̩ ki ñw ibe e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼekeji-we̩
E̩ ki kʼuja bʼone̩ echichi ofo,
Uwe̩ ki lie̩na e̩no̩lachi n
todu e̩nujulu chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ugbo Jihofa,
Ama ki Jihofa na dʼef unyi ame̩ne̩ bibi,
I ache̩de̩te̩ abo ku ma che̩de̩te̩ one̩ chuu,
Ojima chʼe̩wñ ogu kʼamanibe aje̩,
